appearances.title: Squawk Box : CNBC : January 15, 2026 6:00am-9:00am EST
appearances.snippet: joining us right now, republican senator david mccormick. committee's digital assets subcommittee. good morning to you, senator. take us behind the scenes because it felt like we were just oh, so close to something happening here. and then and then i don't know if you think that brian armstrong pulled the rug, or there were just elements of the bill that required the rug to be pulled. >> well good morning. good morning. andrew. yeah. listen, there was a markup schedule that got pushed, but but i i'm still pretty optimistic about this. i mean, we have made enormous progress with chairman scott. banking committee, committee, subcommittee chair lumos and my, my colleagues bernie moreno and senator hagerty have really made an enormous amount of progress. there's still some sticking points, and there's a number of amendments and things being kicked around that i think can potentially resolve those. but the key here is we've got to have a framework that creates certainty, that allows for the innovation and at the same time keeps our banking indust
